code: import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import home from'../images/home.png';import back from'../images/back.png';import revers from'../images/revers.png';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(_ref){var isClickedStatus=_ref.isClickedStatus,isClicked=_ref.isClicked;var location=useLocation();var goBack=function goBack(){window.history.back();};var handleClick=function handleClick(){if(isClickedStatus){isClicked(false);}else{isClicked(true);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:home,className:"header__img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:back,className:location.pathname==='/'?'hidden':'header__img',onClick:goBack}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:revers,className:location.pathname==='/lesson'?'header__img':'hidden',onClick:handleClick})]});}export default Header;
